title: A bill for Rs. 14,600 drawn at 3 months after the date was discounted on 11-11-1995 for Rs. 14, 320. If the discount rate is 20%P.A., on what date was the bill drawn? - Quora

response.answer_text: Interest to be paid 14600=14600–14320=280 Rate=20% Time in days =280*100*365/(14600*20)=35 so due date was 35 days after11 Nov .that is16 Dec it includes 3 days grace. So due date 13 Dec date of writing is 3 months earlier that is13 sept,1995
